dash.start-practicing-description: Put some reps in right now. Let's improve your {language}

onboarding.which-language-learn: Which one language would you like to practice?
onboarding.which-native-language: What is your native language? (or the one you are most comfortable with)
onboarding.languages-are-the-same: Your native language and the language you chose to learn are the same. Please update one of the two before continuing.
